_comment: Created by EFisher on 12/10/2015 14:31:54 using v2.7
title: How long after contacting the surgery did patients actually see or speak to a GP or nurse?
analysis_commentary: After contacting the surgery around half of patients said that they saw someone on the same or next working day (49% in 2013/14 and 48% in 2014/15). In both years a sizeable number of patients also said that it took them more than a week to see someone (16% in 2013/14 and 18% in 2014/15).
